text: ( alarm blaring )
( beeping )

Announcer:
A bloodthirsty predator meets
all American-engineering
in "Fumigator 4."
( screaming )
( slurps, sighs )
All: Ooh!

You know, Anne,
it really is remarkable

- how much you have grown.
- Aw, thanks, Mom.

I mean, you used to be
so irresponsible.

Like, change the grade on your
report card irresponsible.

Heheheh.  Didn't think
you guys knew about that.

But you've really changed,
and you have been so upfront

and honest with us
this whole time.
Right, upfront and honest.
We're just so proud of you.

- Come here, sweetie.
- Bring it in.
( groans )

Hey! I'm going to go
get some coffee ice cream.
Anyone want any? Sprig?

Eh, I'm go-- whoa!
Hey, what gives?
I can't do this anymore.

What?
Eat coffee ice cream?

I agree. It's pretty
risky after five.

No. My folks. I never
told them about Andrias.

Or the robot hunting us.
Or the honking invasion! Ugh!

They think I'm being upfront
and honest, but I'm not.

But you said this was
the only way they'd be okay

- with any of this.
- I know, but it's not right.

I'm going to tell them
everything. Right now.

- Great.
- Mom. Dad.

There's something
I have to tell you.
What is it, sweetie?

- Well, the thing is...
- Aah!
What the heck was that? Huh?

- Anne, what's going on?
- Get down!
Everyone upstairs! Move!
Quick, into my workout room.

Okay, we can hide out
here while we, uh...

Mom, this is not
a workout room!

Yes, it is. When I
thought you ran away,

it's where I worked
out all my stress.

Wait, why is this one
dressed like a doctor?
A mom can dream, can't she?

Why do I get the feeling I'm not
living up to your expectations?

Multiple Anne Boonchuys
confirmed.

- It's after you?
- What?
Eliminating.
Aah!

Okay, maybe there's a couple
things I haven't told you guys.
